Pushed into a journal entry after my amazing LFO entry. That's fine, some people just can't appreciate the soothing sounds of LFO. It's an aquired taste. Anyway, summer's here. Flowers are bloomed, sun's shining (kinda), the OCs on reruns, and I'm sitting on my thumb all day. Shits wack as fuck lately. All I do is work out then come home. I love being at practice but really by the tim i get home ppl havnt even woken up yet. Pisses the fuck outta me but I manage to get by. The really cool people are online when I'm bored and talk to me. The extremely chill ppln actually call me. The dope trillin people come over and give me company. You all know who you are. SHOW ME SOME LOVE! Summer has been pretty boring besides the few pople who keep me from sleeping all day. Marshal, Jordan, Criag, Steven, Michelle, and Willy have been over lately, been getting closer to the team (wow get off,) and I continue bumming rides due to my grounding (o yea, you didnt hear? I actually got grounded this time for grades, the only time I dont make a post about it I get grounded. fucking bad luck.) Cruise coming up on the 26th. Excited for crazy white bitches... I mean... Crazy tourist bitches... yea... mmm tourists... And now for my classic rant: As I get older, greyer and wiser, I like to take time to reflect on the epic journeys I've been on, to remember the strange and wonderful places I've seen, and to chase those damn kids off my lawn. You young whippersnappers! Anyhow, I realized that even with my vast corporate holdings, advanced technology and unlimited scientific knowledge, I've still never been to the end of the universe. So I went on a little road trip this week and decided to see what all the hoopla was about. It took me 16 billion anti-light years to get there, which you might think is a long time, but it's not. It's a long anti-time. It was pretty disappointing though. Just a bunch of old photons from back when time had started, chasing younger photons off their lawns. There wasn't even a place to get a drink, except that restaurant everyone talks about, and they were out of Pan Galactic Gargle Blasters. Then my van broke down, so I gave the whole thing up and came home. Yes, my van. What did you think, I was going to walk? The bright side is that I also got bored on the way back, so I madea new LJ Entry. I posted it form the future, so it should be there by now. btw: Personal MySpace:

Check me out! Music MySpace:

Check me out!

Yea, I've been slacking lately. Whatever. To make all of you feel better I'm going to one of my classic lyric posts. Enjoy this fabolous song by none other than the very hot !!! Marhsall's late. I'm waiting patiently about to passout. Kaifer just called, said he was throwing up and wont be able to make it to practice today. So now I need to find a ride to the Metro Station. Maybe Chris will take me home. I'm too tired so all I'm going to write are sentence fragments. K? K! My legs aren't functioning too well and today we run. I love this idea of waking up early. It's great. Whatever I'm going to go and fall asleep standing up before I cramp up.

EDIT: Left the house at 6:05 and got to practice at 6:15. That's 10 minutes from 12th ave and 8th street to 127th ave and 8th street. Who's a bad ass?

Woah... My livejournal. How much I love thee. I'm sorry i have forsaken thee for your evil twn sister that is MySpace. I promise to treat you well again. No more will I ignore you and youre beautiful body...er, I mean layout. Ah, I'm back.

The God is here. He's here to stay. So many have been complaining that I've been slacking lately with my LJ. I give all of you one big sorry and lick/blowjob. I'll fulfill your LJ needs from now on. Well, now on to business...

Summer... O dear summer. You have been so dull. I want to suffocate you for making this the most boring beggining of summer yet. Atleast I got football. Waking up at 5am and getting practicing at 6:15am. Feels good but really murders the fuck out of my hot sexy nights. But that's fine, I'll find pleasure and entertainment through out the time I'm awake. Usually I fucking sleep till 1 or 2 in the afternoon. Not anymore, by then I'm actually getting ready for work. Yep, lazy ass Josh got off his ass and grabbed a job. I'm working at the EB Games over at bayside. Shits chill, pays average but its really chill. Just what I needed.

I've been waking up at 5am every day now for football practice again. Shits murder. Yet it feels nice to work out before everyone wakes up. Leaves the rest of the day free.

The weekend was sick. I think it got too sick, so I caught something. Those fucking germs. Always holding the latino down. Anyway, Marco was very overrated, but thankfully my room was the hit of Marco. I rented two rooms, and threw 3 parties in 3 nights. Everyone kept coming and going. Didn't know who the fuck they were, nor did I care. I have about one picture of the last party (only time I was sober enough to use a camera.) I took 98 pictures in total from the weekend. But only a couple can be posted due to some law about underage something... Whatever I forget the law. All I know is it's illegal. Fucking ey, man. If you were at Marco and didn't come up to my rooms, you seriously missed the rawest parties. Well here are the few pictures I'm allowed to post up. Half of B.A.C.K.E. (plus C.A.) Navi, Eric, Patter, Pidder Me, and Gus (thug pose) I dont remember this fucking picture... wtf?! Some jerk took pictures of us passed out in our room at 4AM. Tickling/Beating the living shit out of C.A. Shot game Josh #2 brought to my room. Crazy ass party last night of Marco. Those clever phrases on breasteseses are my weakness. Damn, another one. I never can get enough of these shirts. Like I said. Marco is overrated. And I am always right. Don't ever test my gangster. ;D

School's out and I'm on vactaion for the weekend. Too bad that the avg. age at Marco this year will be 14...

We should've gone to the keys instead of overrated ass Marco Island. 

Whatever, I don't plan on remembering it, anyway. ;)

Pictures when I return. Maybe even a video.

16 years ago on the 26th Day of the the 5th month of the year, my younger brother, Jonathan Echeverri, was brought into this world. He has evolved from child supermodel: Into teenage heart-throb: My little brother's personality never ceases to amaze me. If you happen to know my persoanlity, you would know it revolves around sarcasm. Well, imagine my sarcasm x10, and then throw in about 1/2 the randomness that is me, and you have my brother. He is such a beautiful person but very wierd in his very own way. Altough I am as unique as it comes, my brother gets his own category. He can be serious: Or he can be goofy: As much as we both beat the living shit out of eachother, we still always end up making fun of our Mom at the end and laughing it off. Johnny, I hope you don't get too mad when you see I hacked into the network and jacked those pictures of you. ;)  I hope you have an amazing 16th birthday and many more to come. Don't ever change, bc then that would make me the only wierd one in the family. BRO, GET OFF!!! P.S. Ladies, don't ask. I won't hook you up with him.

Fuck people who you thought were you're friends. Odds are they're the worst people you know. Whether or not you cared for them so much, they still are horrible person.

Oh, and people need to stop telling me I'm an "AWESOME GUY," bc I don't even belive that bullshit. Everyone I know has told me that, and it's getting me conceited. I hate it. 

Mankind is naturally evil and there is no way to avoid that. There is no such thing as a good person. Whether you want to believe it or not. Everyone talks shit. Whether they admit it or not... they do. Complete verbal sewage spews from the mouths of those that surround me. I am about nose deep in fecal matter, and am running out of oxygen. 

Everyone just bacdafuckup before I start swinging.

kthxby

Livejournal is still my first love, but fucking MySpace has been getting to me lately. As much as I made fun of it, I've grown to love the little bugger. I'm about a week into it and it hasn't faded. Met people I haven't heard from in a while. That's basically my reasoning for loving it so much. So, yea, whatever, I'm still hardcore.

I'm thinking of redoing this gay ass yellow layout again, and looking into some image mapping. Just bc it makes everything look so much cooler... er... hardcore.

I made Marshall a MySpace and he loves it. Now I have to try and draw Roque into MySpace. He'll fall to the darkside... er... MySpace. Everyone does.

Life is very chill as of the moment. More to come soon at 6.

I was raped today. I was asleep though. Atleast I didn't feel it.











I fell asleep on the 88th question of my 200 question Art History final. I saw Marshall get up and turn in the test when I woke up at 9:30am. So I guessed the rest and turned it in. Fuck you, Gerry.

On a lighter note: Star Wars Episode III opened today. My inner nerd is crying for a taste. But probably wont get it's fix until the weekend or next week. :(

Whatever, hell yea.

Watching "Spice World: The Movie": Marshall: "I can't believe I liked this movie when I was little. It's sooooo gay!" Johnny: "I used to like this movie when I was gay....er....?" Marshall & Me: "Wait... WHAT?! You liked the movie when you were gay?!" Johnny: "OH... GODDAMNIT!"

Weekend was pretty amazing. Turned into one night at the beach to an entire weekend that we can call "Pre-Marco." Not that I'm excited for Marco or anything (bc its the same shit every year,) but yea it felt like a mini-Marco Island. Whatever. Funny thing was this was supposed to be a celebration for Michelle's graduation, but we turned into our own celebration. Me, Mark, Steven, and Bryan rode over the the beach with a duffle bag of liquor just for fun. Didn't think the night would be fun but whatever. We meet up in Nicolle's room and we begin the festivities. As soon as we started getting faded we headed down to the beach and then the prom let out shit got ridiculous. Bon fires, fireworks, everyone hooking up, even people that said they wouldn't hook up went ahead and did it anyways. Those fucking liars ;) . It felt like I was in the middle of Woodstock... Except without the rapes and shit. Actually, maybe there was a rape, I don't know I was too ripped to notice. Saturday I refused to drink, so I watched all the bad influences take body shots and relayed the good news to Michelle bc she wasn't able to attend that night. (Sorry for the lack of  details but if I get into specifics I'd make alot of enemies. Ah fuck it, I'll do it anyways.) Sunday came and we went to the beach. Ate shit, played Volleyball and Frisbee. I dove for everything thing even when it was unecessary. I broke 3 ribs and my shoulder was dislocated, but hey... atleast I didn't get AIDS. o_0??? I have no pictures but I'm sure everyone else does, so I'll bum some off of them later. This week is going to be wierd. I start finals on thurday and am planning on failing bc Art History is a waste and the credits are worthless. Basically: fuck you, Gerry. Then is english and I'm going to rape alexander on his fucking exam. The retard just copy and pasted tests to gether. Then the next week will be a blur. Marco's coming and I'm mildy excited. I'll probably stay sober and look for a fight like I usually do bc I'm hardcore. As a back up plan I'll make sure to bring some entertainment. aka NIGGAZ! Josh the God. (I am a God.)

Dedicated as fuck.

How many times have you heard the phrase "nice guys finish last" ? You probably can't even count how many times you've heard some frustrated guy say this. You might even say this yourself quite frequently. So, what is it about "Nice Guys" that cause their hearts to get stomped on by women and people in general? I'm going to help explain this as clearly as possible. First, it is NOT the fact that a guy is "nice" that makes him unattractive to women. Being nice is a great personality trait and there's nothing wrong with being a nice person. So many men are under the impression that they were "too nice" and that's why they got stomped on and stepped over. Wrong ! No more Mr. Nice Guy The first and most crucial mistake a guy can make is to lie to himself about the REAL reason that woman got scared off. Most of the time he is just too needy and attempts to build his entire existence and happiness around being with her. Guys...this is TOO MUCH pressure and feels suffocating. Men don't like overly needy women and women don't like overly needy men. So, how do you avoid turning into a clump of belly button lint stuck in some woman's navel? Simple...do NOT build your life around her or anyone else, for that matter. Have your own interests and activities. Build a happy and healthy life for yourself so that when you do find a good woman she compliments the good life you already have rather than creates or completes your life. Every good and quality relationship includes time away from each other and room for each person to be an individual as well as part of a couple. Another mistake so many nice guys make is to devote all of their time into doing things for other people to the point where they aren't taking care of themselves. Learn to say no when you need or want to say it. It's okay to put your own needs and wants ahead of doing things for others that they could do for themselves. If you don't take care of yourself first you won't be worth a damn to anyone else. How can you be there for that woman in your life if you don't see to your own needs first? You can't. Love is a wonderful thing, and it's a precious gift you can give to other people. However, most importantly, you MUST love yourself first. Until you can genuinely love yourself you can't love another person in a healthy way. So many "nice guys" mistakenly believe that if they worship the ground a woman walks on and idolizes her that she will automatically return the same treatment towards him. These are what I like to call "Unrealistic Expectations". More often than not, these kinds of expectations go unmet and lead to pain, frustration and sometimes anger. These expectations are nothing more than premeditated resentments. This isn't healthy behavior and what it boils down to is a heavy dose of self inflicted suffering. Never set yourself up for this kind of disappointment. Treat yourself better than this. Finally...if a man spends all of his time catering to the whims of others, how can he find the time to have a full and rich life? He can't, and his life is spent helping others to make their lives more interesting while his life becomes more and more dull and boring. He has little energy left for his own adventures and excitement and his love life suffers as a result. Women don't like boredom and stagnation. The mistakes nice guys make are *Being too needy *Unrealistic Expectations/Premeditated Resentments *Idolizing a woman *Living for everyone else but himself and becoming dull *Making his happiness and existence too dependent on his relationships with others If you recognize your own behavior in this list, you have probably blamed your "niceness" for hindering your relationships with women. Hopefully this article will help you to see and understand exactly where the problem is and what you need to do to fix it. Here are a few things you can start doing right away to help you to stop making this mistakes with women. *Start saying "No" when you don't want to do someone a favor. "Sorry, I can't" is just as easy to say, and the world won't stop turning if you say no. *Go spend some time with and on yourself...make your life exciting and interesting. Do things you enjoy just because you enjoy it. You deserve this! It's YOUR life! *Don't worship women. They are human, make mistakes and aren't perfect. They are just like you for the most part, and are no better or worse than you are. Don't treat them like they deserve more than you do. If you don't respect yourself women won't respect you either. *You "need" food and water. You "need" shelter. You don't "need" any specific person to create your happiness and make you "somebody". If you feel like you "need" someone else to be happy then your feelings towards that person are NOT healthy. It's healthy to "want" someone to compliment who you ALREADY are, but NOT to "need" someone to define or complete you. In conclusion ... don't lose the niceness, lose the neediness. On a lighter note: I ordered Dominos American Cheeseburger Pizza. That shit is so hot when ordered with no tomatoes and onions. The perfect munchies food. ;)

Your Birthdate: December 6
A birthday on the 6th of the month adds a tone of responsibility, helpfulness, and understanding to your natural inclinations. Those born on the sixth are more apt to be open and honest with everyone, and more caring about family and friends, too. This is a number associated with responsibility and caring - this birthday lends a degree of concern for others.
What Does Your Birth Date Mean?

It's 3:40 and im still awake. I've been lying in bed since 11:30. My brain, heart, eyes, and pores are going crazy. They feel like they're are going to explode.

I don't understand the reason why you act this way. What did I do? Tell me what's the problem here. I don't wanna see you leave. I don't wanna let you go. I just wanna find a way to work it out. We've been through so many good and bad times. We tried to start over. I tried to make it right so many times. What went wrong?

I'm destind to fail. Your destined to fail. Prom is tonight. I'm mildly looking forward to it. I don't know whats wrong with me lately, but I've completly given up on everything. If something turns out bad I just won't care. I won't attempt to fix it or to find out what was wrong... I just don't care anymore. Everything can fall all part in my life right now for all I care. Yea, sure... of course I don't want that to happen, but if it were to happen I would seriously consider joining the military just to get away from my life. I might soung like I hate life right now, but the truth is I love it and everything about it. The thing that's making me feel like this is the fact that nothing lasts forever, no matter if its good or bad... it will eventually fade to black. You might want that for bad situations, but you will never want that for good ones. You want the good times to last forever, but deep down inside you know that is impossible and that you will eventually get hurt. Fuck, I'm just talking out of my ass. What the fuck do I know? Jesus, just please let tonight be something that I can remember forever. Something that I don't ever want to end. Something that I can enjoy so fun with my friends. Something I can share so beautifully with my love. Something that I can't complain about... Michelle is the only reason why I care about anything.

Now I'm going to throw in one of my random stories: Have you ever had a job interview where people ask you questions like, "Describe your weaknesses", or "What are three words that describe you?". I have. Apparently the correct answer is not "awesome", "seriously awesome", and "magnificent". I figured later that they probably didn't like the answer because that was actually four words. That's ok, who really needs a Vice President of Everything position at some multi-national corporation anyway. They were probably just looking for a patsy to take the fall for their accounting anyway. I mean, who wouldn't hire somebody that is awesome, not to mention seriously awesome? Even if I did list my major weakness as "working". I'm still awesome. Seriously.

My mind is so clear at this point that nothing can mess it up. It just feels so... so... good. ;) Is this love, is this love, is this love, is this love that I'm feelin? Oh, yes I know, yes I know, yes I know now...

To all my fans that have kept up with my livejournal since the summer. Remember when I got into that fight with that 40 year old man? Well yea something similar happend again on my way back from dropping my brother off somewhere.

I'm driving back home and there are these circles in the middle of the intersections in my neighborhood that we have to go around. There is a yield sign for those cars approaching the circles. I'm driving around the circles and out of nowhere a dominoes delivery guy speeds through the circle and ignores the yield sign. The motherfucker almost hits me. I beep the horn and scream out the window (half-thuggish), "WTF, NIGGA?! YOU GOTTA YIELD!!!" He stops the car in the middle of the road and gets out all hardcore looking and shit. He points at me and says, "THE FUCK YOU TALKING TO?!" I'm like wow, this fag really wants to fight me... So I boost the volume of the radio and jump out of the car. I swear... by coincidence, Knuck If You Buck was playing. Wiiiiieeeerd. I look at him and he's approximately 5 foot 6 or 5 foot 8, I couldn't make it out he was about 10 yards in front of me. I give him a hard stare and ask him normally (yet still semi-thuggish), "So, what'chu wanna do, dog?"

I'm already clenching my fists read for him to charge, but he either realized that his pizza was getting cold or that I was about four inches taller than him and was able to rip his throat out of the back of his head and looks at me and then at the sign and says, "Oh, may bad. I didn't see the sign." He then promptly jumps in his car and speeds off. I'm left there fucking thinking... "WTF just happened?!" I then can't stop laughing in the middle of the road and get back into my car. Drive home and write it in here. Wow...

That's another story to archive as a memory.

I'm probably gonna go watch Sin City tonight with DWD (original crew lol.) So... How about I treat all of you to another consecutive story? Sounds good, huh? ...just read: I'm bored as dick, so I'm just gonna remind you about somthing. Many of you know that my LiveJournal is a cure for boredom for both you and me, but I also double as a nation-wide public service announcement network. It's an important role, and I don't take it lightly. I brought you the latest news in the horrific lawn flamingo invasions of 2003.  And last year's skimboarding hobo olympics would have gone completely unnoticed if not for the quick action of my dedicated professional journalism. And who brought you the news that Elvis was alive in a hotel in Kansas City, but was being kept prisoner by aliens that had cloned Hilary Clinton? Well, that was probably the Enquirer, but it could have been me. I'm a bit fuzzy on that one. But in keeping with my strong devotion to public service and enlightenment, I'd like to remind you to set your clocks forward this Sunday. Oh, and keep your eyes out for lawn flamingo scouting parties. I've heard they've been building up forces in your area, and I can not allow a lawn flamingo expansion gap. Mostly the clock thing though.

Man, this shit's gonna be so unpredictable. Such high expectations.

Welcome me home with open arms, bitches.

Delicious hotdogs will rain from the heavens and solve world hunger... one day. Until then, there will be my world famous hot dog parties. Every weekend I'll invite a select few of well rounded friends to come and share the pleasure of eating hotdogs with me. Unfortunately, this weekend's hotdog party was planned and set for today at noon, but no one took me serioulsy. They'll know better next time. ;) Friday was pretty much a joke, but I enjoyed myself around the time my nipple froze off and I couldnt feel any of my arms or legs. Me, Mark, Bryan, Joe, Marshall, Roque, Ian, Bofill, Johnny, and Javi went to Drenched over at the Bayside Hut. Had a little trouble at the beggining, but that was solved with a quick talk with Alex. I was introduced to more people from Gawdrock. Pretty straight. I walked myself to the front of the line like I was important or something. What fools to let me skip them. Night got cold, we got wet, people got sick, bryan got a flat tire, we fell asleep in the cold with our wet clothes on, and then finally me and Mark got home to Marshall at the door in his boxers. We woke up on Saturday and chilled with our thumbs in our asses while we kept asking eachother what we're gonna do today. The all of a sudden me and Mark clicked and decided to throw a party... Steaks and Beer. The only way to throw a party. We invited Michelle, Evelyn, and Natasha over. Willy came over later, too. We downed 3 6 packs of Smirnoff Twizted Watermelon, and Smirnoff Triple Black. Then two 12 packs of Amstel light. We got crunker than Lil' Scrappy over a recycled beat. Michelle got a bit.... inarticulate (she started slurring her words...lol) We ended the night in my room. People had sex, someone got naked, Michelle nailed me in the nuts so hard I couldn't breathe. I have never been hit so hard in my life. EVER! She didn't even say sorry. :( Then later she stuck me in the face. Once again, I couldn't breathe. Goddamnit that hurt, too! I told everyone to come over for a hotdog party and everyone said yes, but no one showed up the next day. Whatever! We woke up and waited, and then moved on and headed over to Miracle Mile.
